title: a.dom To-Do List
description: This is a to-do list web application written in a templating language called a.dom.

title: Blackhole Simulation
description: This is an animation that predominantly replicates a black hole so to speak using HTML5 Canvas.

title: Interactive Starfield
description: A seemingly endless interactive starfield animation using HTML5 Canvas by simply manipulating an array.

title: Twitter Bot
description: This script retweets and likes tweets from specific preset accounts using Node JS.
